== Typst with quarto code blocks

Here is a grid with mermaid (@fig-mermaid)  and graphviz (@fig-graphviz) code blocks:

#grid(columns: 2, [

```{mermaid}
%%| label: fig-mermaid
%%| fig-cap: mermaid
%%| fig-width: 3
flowchart LR
  A[Hard edge] --> B(Round edge)
  B --> C{Decision}
  C --> D[Result one]
  C --> E[Result two]
```

], [

```{dot}
//| label: fig-graphviz
//| fig-cap: graphviz
//| fig-width: 3
//| fig-height: 1.75
graph G {
  layout=neato
  run -- intr;
  intr -- runbl;
  runbl -- run;
  run -- kernel;
  kernel -- zombie;
  kernel -- sleep;
  kernel -- runmem;
  sleep -- swap;
  swap -- runswap;
  runswap -- new;
  runswap -- runmem;
  new -- runmem;
  sleep -- runmem;
}
```

])
